From: 
To: 
Subject: RE: 
Date: Thu, 25 Jul 2019 14:40:12 +0000 
Yup 
From 
Sent: Thursday, July 25, 2019 10:39 AM 
To: 
Subject: 
A week after being denied bail, Jeffrey E. Epstein was found unconscious in his 
cell on Tuesday at a federal jail in 
Manhattan with marks on his neck, and prison 
officials were treating the incident as 
a possible suicide attempt, a law 
enforcement official who had been briefed on the 
matter 
said 
Mr. Epstein's injuries were not serious, said the official, who requested his name 
not be 
published because he was not authorized to speak on the matter. The 
Bureau of Prisons did not immediately respond to requests for information. 
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/07/25/nyregion/jeffrey-epstein-injured-jail.html? 
action=click&module=Top%20Stories&pgtype=Homepage 
EFTA00022539
